'''Preliminary Proliferating Organism''' is a special enemy encountered during Phase 2 of the [[Guardian of Apep's Oasis]] Weekly Boss. Two are also encountered earlier during {{Quest|What Shape Does the Self Hold}}.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats|dendro_res=50%|hp_ratio=1.6|hp_type=2|atk_ratio=0.2|atk_type=2|hide_notes=1}}

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Preliminary Proliferating Organism

|name_1      = Melee Attack
|desc_1      = Performs a melee strike, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and reducing cleansing progress by '''0.6%'''. If buffed by a Provender Proliferating Organism, DMG is increased to '''80% ATK''' and cleansing progress reduction is increased to '''1.2%'''.

|name_2      = Ranged Attack
|desc_2      = Fires an orb, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Dendro DMG}} and reducing cleansing progress by '''0.6%'''. If buffed by a Provender Proliferating Organism, DMG is increased to '''100% ATK''' and cleansing progress reduction is increased to '''1.2%'''.
}}
